## ReadableRmm interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Read state of Rmm protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReadableRmm 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [connection](./rmm-ethers.readablermm.connection.md) | [EthersRmmConnection](./rmm-ethers.ethersrmmconnection.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Connection to Rmm protocol. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getLiquidityBalance(poolId, address, overrides)](./rmm-ethers.readablermm.getliquiditybalance.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Fetches <code>account</code>'s balance of liquidity for <code>poolId</code>. |
|  [getPool(poolId, overrides)](./rmm-ethers.readablermm.getpool.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Constructs a  entity from a <code>poolId</code>. |
|  [getPosition(pool, address, overrides)](./rmm-ethers.readablermm.getposition.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Constructs a [Position](./rmm-ethers.position.md) entity from a Pool entity and by fetching the <code>account</code>'s balance of liquidity. |
